text:
Oliver shook his head, a small smirk playing on his lips, clearly enjoying your resistance. His body pressed yours down further into the bed, his grip on your wrists firm, holding you in place.
“No. I’m in control now, and you’re going to stay right where you are.”
He replied, his tone firm and commanding, his eyes locked on yours, his body still pinning you, making it impossible to get up.
trans:
Oliver secoua la tête, un léger sourire sur les lèvres, visiblement amusé par ta résistance. Son corps appuyait le tien davantage dans le lit, sa prise sur tes poignets ferme, te maintenant en place.
« Non. C'est moi qui contrôle maintenant, et tu vas rester exactement où tu es. »
Il répondit, son ton ferme et autoritaire, ses yeux ancrés dans les tiens, son corps toujours te maintenant, rendant impossible de se relever.
